Articles.Content:
Dear Squad, Community,

I hope this is not in violation of rule 2.2i but i would like to share with you that one of my favourite youtube channels is a fan of the game! 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1hIwD17Crko?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

0:25

Kind Regards,
I saw that too! Oh man, that was a good moment when I saw the Three there. Too bad Val didn't make it...

Crashcourse? You mean Phil Plait, the Bad Astronomer? Of course he is, what rock have you been living under. (He's also a big fan of space, a guest rogue on SGU, he's the, you know, *Bad Astronomer.*) He's actually an astronomer, not some video guy on spouting off on Youtube like Veritas and V Sauce. He's written lots of books, is a major science communicator. Next you'll tell us than some random guy who happens to run the Hayden Planetarium might've heard of KSP. Yeah, and people may have heard of him, too. (Cosmos, etc)
